name: The Sister I Never Had - 4
description:
I remembered clearly
I was pushing your wheelchair and fixing your beanie
You’re the sister I never had
I hanged some blankets around your shoulder
While we walk on a garden full of roses
You’re the sister I never had
We reminisced our fondest memories
Memories of our mischiefs and of pain
You’re the sister I never had
You scooped me within your arms with such fear within your eyes
You mumbled, “ I’m scared.” And held my hand even tighter
I talked about the tale of your courage that afternoon and slept beside your bed
Only to wake up in the morning that you bravely accepted your fate.

by Jovierose
